hero.title: Kusintha kwa Digito ku Malawi wa Masiku Ano
hero.subtitle: Kulimbikitsa boma, mabizinesi, ndi anthu ammudzi ndi mayankho a cloud apamwamba, luntha la AI, ndi ntchito za digito zatsopano.

services.title: Ntchito Zathu
services.subtitle: Mayankho athunthu a digito opangidwa kwa zosowa za Malawi

cloud-modern-work.title: Cloud ndi Ntchito Zamakono
cloud-modern-work.description: Kusamutsa ku Azure, kukhazikitsa Microsoft 365, ndi mayankho a malo ogwira ntchito amakono

data-ai.title: Data ndi AI
data-ai.description: Kusanthula kwa Power BI, ulamuliro wa data, ndi luntha la AI

security-compliance.title: Chitetezo ndi Kutsatira Malamulo
security-compliance.description: Microsoft Defender, malamulo otsatira, ndi chitetezo cha cyber

power-platform.title: Power Platform
power-platform.description: Mapulogalamu osavuta kupanga, makina, ndi mayankho apadera

government-portals.title: Ma Portal a Boma
government-portals.description: Ntchito za nzika, nsanja za e-boma, ndi kusintha kwa digito

managed-services.title: Ntchito Zoyang'aniridwa
managed-services.description: Chithandizo cha 24/7, kuyang'anira, ndi zida za cloud zoyang'aniridwa

contact.title: Lumikizani nafe
contact.subtitle: Mwakonzeka kusintha mapangidwe anu a digito? Tiyeni tikambirane zofunikira zanu.

form.name: Dzina Lonse
form.phone-placeholder: Lembani nambala yanu ya foni (zosakhala zachikakamiza)
form.organization-placeholder: Lembani dzina la bungwe lanu (zosakhala zachikakamiza)
form.message-placeholder: Tiwuzeni zomwe mukufuna ndipo mmene tingakuthandizireni
form.consent: Ndikuvomera malamulo a chinsinsi ndi malamulo ogwirira ntchito
form.error: Pepani, panali vuto potumiza uthenga wanu. Chonde yesaninso.

footer.description: Mgwirizano wamkulu wa kusintha kwa digito ku Malawi, kupereka mayankho a cloud atsopano ndi ntchito za AI kwa makasitomala a boma ndi mabizinesi.
footer.partners-description: Ogwirizana ovomerezeka opereka mayankho apamwamba kwambiri

holo-school.title: Pulojekiti ya Holo-School
holo-school.subtitle: Njira yatsopano ya kuperekedwa maphunziro a holographic ku miyendo ya Malawi

hero.title: Kubweretsa Maphunziro Apamwamba ku Mudzi Uliwonse
hero.description: Kugwiritsa ntchito tekinoloje ya holographic, ntchito za cloud za Azure, ndi zida za kuwulutsa za MACRA kuti apereke zokumana nazo zamaphunziro ku madera akutali a Malawi.

why.title: Chifukwa chiyani Holo-School?
points: Kuthana ndi kusalingana kwa maphunziro m'madera akumidzi
Kupereka mwayi wopeza aphunzitsi okwanira kudzera pa tekinoloje
Njira yolimba ya kuperekedwa kudzera pa tekinoloje ya RF
Yankho lomwe lingafalitsidwe ku dziko lonse

how.title: Momwe Zimagwirira Ntchito
steps: Kupanga zinthu mu studio ya Azure Media Services
Kuwulutsa pa nthawi yeniyeni kudzera pa Microsoft Teams
Kuwulutsa kwa MACRA RF ku ma screen a hologram ammudzi
Mawu ogwirizana kudzera pa ma headset opanda zingwe

pilot.title: Pulogalamu ya Mayeso
pilot.description: Pulogalamu ya mayeso pamalo atatu kuonetsa kuti zidzatheke ndikuyeza zotsatira

tech.title: Zida za Tekinoloje
tech.azure: Azure Media Services pakuperekedwa kwazinthu ndi CDN
tech.teams: Microsoft Teams pakumana ndi anthu pa nthawi yeniyeni
tech.apps: Power Apps pakuonera kopezeka ndi ndemanga

cta.title: Pemphan Kalata ya Mayeso
cta.description: Pezani zambiri za kukhazikitsa pulogalamu ya mayeso ya Holo-School

assistant.title: Wothandiza wa AI
assistant.placeholder: Funitsani chilichonse cha ntchito zathu, mayankho, kapena mmene tingakuthandizirentu...
assistant.error: Pepani, ndili ndi vuto tsopano. Chonde yesaninso.
assistant.welcome: Moni! Ndine wothandiza wanu wa Korena Digital Solutions. Kodi ndingathandize bwanji lero?
